description: Benchmarking tool to measure Stratum V2 and Stratum (V1) protocol performances in different contexts

panels.title: SV1 vs SV2 - block template value
SV2 - block template value - comparison with mined blocks on the network

panels.title: SV1 vs SV2 - block propagation time

targets.expr:
(
  (
    avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.17", dst="10.5.0.4"}[20s]))[5m:])
    -
    max(
      avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.8", src="10.5.0.19"}[20s]))[5m:]) 
      or 
      vector(0)
    )
  )
  /
  avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.8", src="10.5.0.19"}[20s]))[5m:])
)
* 100

(
  (
    avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.17", src="10.5.0.4"}[20s]))[5m:])
    -
    max(
      avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.8", dst="10.5.0.19"}[20s]))[5m:]) 
      or 
      vector(0)
    )
  )
  /
  avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.8", dst="10.5.0.19"}[20s]))[5m:])
)
* 100

max(
    sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.8", dst="10.5.0.19"}[20s])) or vector(0)
)
+ 
sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.16", dst!="192.168.65.1", dst!="10.5.0.8", dst!="10.5.0.21", dst!="192.168.65.7"}[20s]))

(
  (
    avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.17", src="10.5.0.4"}[20s]))[5m:])
    +
    avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.2", dst!="192.168.65.1", dst!="10.5.0.4", dst!="10.5.0.5", dst!="10.5.0.20", dst!="192.168.65.7"}[20s]))[5m:])
    -
    (
    max(
      avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.8", dst="10.5.0.19"}[20s]))[5m:]) 
      or 
      vector(0)
    )
    + avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.16", dst!="192.168.65.1", dst!="10.5.0.8", dst!="10.5.0.21", dst!="192.168.65.7"}[20s]))[5m:])
    )
  )
  /
  (
  avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.8", dst="10.5.0.19"}[20s]))[5m:])
  +
  avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.4", dst="10.5.0.17"}[20s]))[5m:])
  +
  avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.2", dst!="192.168.65.1", dst!="10.5.0.4", dst!="10.5.0.5", dst!="10.5.0.20", dst!="192.168.65.7"}[20s]))[5m:])
  )
)
* 100

max(
    sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.8", src="10.5.0.19"}[20s])) or vector(0)
)
+
sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.16", src!="192.168.65.1", src!="10.5.0.8", src!="10.5.0.21", src!="192.168.65.7"}[20s]))

(
  (
    avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.17", dst="10.5.0.4"}[20s]))[5m:])
    +
    avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.2", src!="192.168.65.1", src!="10.5.0.4", src!="10.5.0.5", src!="10.5.0.20", src!="192.168.65.7"}[20s]))[5m:])
    -
    (
    max(
      avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.8", src="10.5.0.19"}[20s]))[5m:]) 
      or 
      vector(0)
    )
    + avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.16", src!="192.168.65.1", src!="10.5.0.8", src!="10.5.0.21", src!="192.168.65.7"}[20s]))[5m:])
    )
  )
  /
  (
  avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.8", src="10.5.0.19"}[20s]))[5m:])
  +
  avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.4", src="10.5.0.17"}[20s]))[5m:])
  +
  avg_over_time(sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.2", src!="192.168.65.1", src!="10.5.0.4", src!="10.5.0.5", src!="10.5.0.20", src!="192.168.65.7"}[20s]))[5m:])
  )
)
* 100

title: SRI benchmarking tool
